rooms.name: Drone Hanger
rooms.desc:
This room holds the repair and maintenance utility drones.
There is a door to the north

rooms.name: Cryopod Chambers
rooms.desc:
This room holds passengers during cryosleep. Eight pods are situated in a circle around a central pillar, all emitting a low intensity white light.
A large doorway leads to the west, but it is blocked by a pile of rubble. There are exits to the north, east, and south

objects.name: Pile of Rubble
objects.desc: The precarious pile of rubble blocks the way to the west

rooms.name: Dark Room
rooms.desc: The room is pitch black, not much can be done here

rooms.name: Fitness Center
rooms.desc:
This room is used to keep crew members in peak physical condition during long expeditions.
There is a shower in the corner, a row of lockers, and various fitness equipment scattered around the area

objects.name: Lockers
objects.desc: It is a long wall of sealed lockers

objects.name: Shower
objects.desc: A showerhead is positioned directly above a button that activates the water flow

rooms.name: Lodging
rooms.desc:
This room is where crew members can relax, catch up on rest, or enjoy leisure time. The room is dark aside from the light seeping in from the cryopods, which illuminates a row of lockers on the opposite wall.
There is an exit to the west, and doors leading north, east, and south

objects.name: Lockers
objects.desc: It is a long wall of sealed lockers. One seems to be slightly ajar

rooms.name: Dark Room
rooms.desc: The room is pitch black, not much can be done here

rooms.name: Cafeteria
rooms.desc: This room holds a large array of state of the art cutlery and exquisite ingredients for gourmet meals

rooms.name: Power Room
rooms.desc:
This crowded room is filled with many loud machines used to provide the various rooms in the Infinity with power. A small emergency lamp attached to the wall illuminates a wrench on the floor next to a scrap of paper. Four pipes line the wall, labeled "A", "B", "C", and "D".
A door leads to the north

objects.name: Wrench
objects.desc: A wrench that is used for various maintenance tasks aboard the Infinity

objects.name: Scrap of Paper
objects.desc:
The paper has the following hastily written on it with pen:
- + + -

objects.name: Pipe A
objects.desc: A large pipe with a square knob, much too small to turn with bare hands. A placard above the knob has an "A" printed on it

objects.name: Pipe B
objects.desc: A large pipe with a square knob, much too small to turn with bare hands. A placard above the knob has an "B" printed on it

objects.name: Pipe C
objects.desc: A large pipe with a square knob, much too small to turn with bare hands. A placard above the knob has an "C" printed on it

objects.name: Pipe D
objects.desc: A large pipe with a square knob, much too small to turn with bare hands. A placard above the knob has an "D" printed on it

rooms.name: Water Supply
rooms.desc: This room holds purifiers, distillers, and a large steel tank. Rusted pipes sprout from the tank and disappear into the walls of the room. A large red wheel valve sits on the wall next to the tank

objects.name: Tank
objects.desc: Reading the signs posted on the tank, it seems to hold water

objects.name: Pipes
objects.desc: The pipes are in very bad shape

objects.name: Wheel Valve
objects.desc: It appears to be connected to the tank by a large main pipe

rooms.name: Bio Lab
rooms.desc:
The room is used to study the many plants and biotic organisms that the crew might come across during interplanetary travel. A broken pipe lay underneath a window, looking into the garden. A large door sits next to the window.
There is a small sealed bag of fertilizer laying near the microscopes, beakers, and test tubes

objects.name: Fertilizer
objects.desc: A label on the front reads "Mix with water for effective results"

objects.name: Microscope
objects.desc: There is a small sticky note stuck to the side of the microscope

objects.name: Pipe
objects.desc: Rust has developed a large hole in this pipe. Water drips from the hole

objects.name: Window
objects.desc: The garden beyond is filled with water

objects.name: Door
objects.desc: It won't budge

rooms.name: Garden
rooms.desc: This room is adorned with many varieties of flora and fauna used in cooking and medicinal research. There is a window at the side of the room next to a large door. A huge tree stands in the center of the room with strange looking fruit dangling from its low-hanging branches. Rusted pipes dangle from the ceiling

objects.name: Tree
objects.desc: The tree looks sickly, as do its fruit

objects.name: Window
objects.desc: The laboratory on the other side of the window looks flooded

objects.name: Door
objects.desc: It won't budge

objects.name: Pipes
objects.desc: The pipes are in very poor shape, with water dripping from a few of them

objects.name: Wilted Fruit
objects.desc: The fruit looks dehydrated and useless

rooms.name: Dark Room
rooms.desc: The room is pitch black, not much can be done here

rooms.name: Laundry Room
rooms.desc: This room is filled to the brim with washers and dryers. An empty spray bottle sits atop one of the washers

objects.name: Spray Bottle
objects.desc: The spray bottle is empty

rooms.name: Checkpoint A
rooms.desc: Thank you for playing the game! There is more to come later, this is just the beginning...

rooms.name: The Washrooms
rooms.desc: This room is where people use the restroom, occupied with toilets, urinals and sinks

rooms.name: The Closet
rooms.desc: This small room has everything needed to clean a large mess.

rooms.name: The Long Hallway
rooms.desc: This long hallway separates the living quarters of the ship into functional components operating The Infinity.

rooms.name: The Long Hallway
rooms.desc: The end of The Long Hallway. Branches off to the temperature control section and the medical section of The Infinity.

rooms.name: The Storage Room
rooms.desc: This room has large crates and containers that were to be used during the construction of the assigned mission.

rooms.name: The Restricted Section
rooms.desc: Apart of the storage room, The Restricted Section has dangerous, explosive, and unregulated related crates and barrels.

rooms.name: The Medical Bay
rooms.desc: The Medical Bay on The Infinity holds state of the art medical instruments to cure any ailments. A large X-Ray screen is the main focal point in the room.

rooms.name: The Surgical Center
rooms.desc: This room has many operating tables for well trained surgeons to perform any procedure.

rooms.name: The Oxygen Production Room
rooms.desc: There is a large steaming tank with many other valves and pistons conjunctionally moving with one another in this room. This large intricate machine produces oxygen for passengers of The Infinity.

rooms.name: The Chemical Lab
rooms.desc: The Chemical Lab stores many compound ingredients that can be used during scientific processing. Bubbling tubes of many colors float around the perimeter of the room.

rooms.name: The Spa Room
rooms.desc: The Spa Room is issued for those experiencing mental space related illnesses. This transcendent spa is heated to a perfect temperature to cleanse the mind, body, and soul.

rooms.name: The Heating Chamber
rooms.desc: This hot room contains a large pyrotheum generator that heats the ship.

rooms.name: The Boiler Room
rooms.desc: This room regulates the temperatures produced by the Heating Chamber and The Cooling Chamber.

rooms.name: The Cooling Chamber
rooms.desc: This frigid room has a large vessel containing multiple cooling cells, attributing to The Infinity’s AC system. There are icicles dangling from the grafters above.

rooms.name: Checkpoint B
rooms.desc: This is a nicer regroup room. This room is seemingly empty but has a large glass ceiling.

rooms.name: The Solar Panel Maintenance Room.
rooms.desc: This room has a large glass wall on the west side overseeing the gargantuan solar panels. There is a control system along the wall to turn panels facing solar bodies.

rooms.name: The Observatory
rooms.desc: This beautiful room is surrounded with glass where hallways deviate in all directions. Here passengers can get an almost 360 degree view of space around them.

rooms.name: The Escape Pods
rooms.desc: In case of emergency, these escape pods offer a quick getaway during an imminent crisis.

rooms.name: The Captain's Quarters
rooms.desc: This classic Captain’s Quarters room is decorated with a large library, a modest wooden desk and a large glass wall facing the west. Next to the wall is a small little hatch that one could fit through.

rooms.name: The Captain's Escape Pod
rooms.desc: This hidden escape pod is like that of the other pods on the ship, however it is speculated that this one is unregulated and a secret to other passengers of The Infinity.

rooms.name: The Short Hallway
rooms.desc: This hallway is a bridge from the observation deck to the command center.

rooms.name: The Shield Maintenance Room
rooms.desc: This compact room has large, blue, pulsating generators that emit a plasma that surround The Infinity to ensure safety.

rooms.name: The Communications Array
rooms.desc: This large board room has many blinking lights, screens with different rooms on them and panels to keep the ship steady. There is a small section in this room that is used to relay messages back to home base with database of all prerecorded messages to The Infinity.

rooms.name: The Conference Room
rooms.desc: This organized conference room, stationed with laptops, desks and filing cabinets is used to debrief any information gathered from the Communications Array. There is a large holographic image on the south wall illustrating the ship’s trajectory and anything that might show up on exterior proximity radars.

rooms.name: The Control Room
rooms.desc: This room is cramped with various sparking wires and outlets. This complicated mazes or wires and circuit boards ensure functional electricity to be properly regulated amongst the ship.

rooms.name: The Gravity Room
rooms.desc: This room is suspended with a thin grated bridge leading to an ominous spire that creates artificial gravity to The Infinity. Below the grated bridge is what seems to be an endless pit.

rooms.name: The Cockpit Gate
rooms.desc: A large indestructible gate stands in the way, separating the passengers and crew from The Cockpit. A small keypad is what is seemingly used to open the gate.

rooms.name: Checkpoint C
rooms.desc: This eerie, quiet, empty regroup room separates the entirety of The Infinity to the Cockpit forward north.

rooms.name: The Cockpit
rooms.desc: This is the very front of The Infinity. It oversees all facets of the ship. There is a large glass wall facing north where the impending black hole lies. There are buttons and levers along the wall that offer as an override to any of the systems on board.
